abilities.name: Damage Swap
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move 1 damage counter from 1 of your Pokémon to another as long as you don't Knock Out that Pokémon. This power can't be used if Alakazam is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

abilities.name: Rain Dance
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may attach 1 Water Energy Card to 1 of your Water Pokémon. (This doesn't use up your 1 Energy card attachment for the turn.) This power can't be used if Blastoise is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Hydro Pump
attacks.effect: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each attached Water Energy attached to Blastoise but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

attacks.name: Scrunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Chansey during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Double-edge
attacks.effect: Chansey does 80 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Energy Burn
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all Energy attached to Charizard into Fire Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can't be used if Charizard is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Fire Spin
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Sing
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Metronome
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of Defending Pokémon's attacks. Metronome copies that attack except for its Energy costs and anything else required in order to use that attack, such as discarding energy cards. (No matter what type the defender is, Clefairy's type is still Colorless.)

attacks.name: Bubblebeam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

abilities.name: Strikes Back
abilities.effect: Whenever your opponent's attack damages Machamp (even if Machamp is Knoced Out), this power does 10 damage to attacking Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.) This power can't be used if Machamp is already Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed when your opponent attacks.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magneton does 80 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Psychic
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Barrier
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Mewtwo in order to use this attack. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Mewtwo.

attacks.name: Thrash
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Nidoking does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Toxic
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned. It now takes 20 Poison damage instead of 10 after each player's turn (even if it was already Poisoned).

attacks.name: Lure
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, choose 1 of them and switch it with the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Fire Blast
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Ninetales in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage plus 10 more damage for each Water Energy attached to Poliwrath but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Water Energy after the 2nd doesn't count.

attacks.name: Whirlpool
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 and discard it.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Raichu.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Raichu does 30 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Energy Trans
abilities.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may take 1 Grass Energy card attached to 1 of your Pokémon and attach it to a different one. This power can't be used if Venusaur is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Zapdos does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Thunderbolt
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy cards attached to Zapdos in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Twineedle
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Slam
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Hyper Beam
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has any Energy cards attached to it, choose 1 of them and discard it.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your own Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thundershock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Thunderpunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 damage plus 10 more damage; if tails, this attack does 30 damage and Electabuzz does 10 damage to itself.

abilities.name: Buzzap
abilities.effect: At any time during your turn (before your attack) you may Knock Out Electrode and attach it to 1 of your other Pokémon. If you do, chose a type of Energy. Electrode is now an Energy card (instead of a Pokémon) that provides 2 energy of that type. This power can't be used if Electrode is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Electric Shock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Electrode does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Mirror Move
attacks.effect: If Pidgeotto was attacked last turn, do the final result of that attack on Pidgeotto to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Arcanine in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: Arcanine does 30 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmeleon in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Ice Beam
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Leek Slap
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing. Either way, you can't use this attack again as long as Farfetch'd stays in play (even putting Farfetch'd on the Bench won't let you use it again.)

attacks.name: Hypnosis
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Dream Eater
attacks.effect: You can't this attack unless the Defending Pokémon is Asleep.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Meditate
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage plus 10 more damage for each damage counter on the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Kadabra in order use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Kadabra.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Kakuna during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Karate Chop
attacks.effect: Does 50 damage minus 10 for each damage counter on Machoke.

attacks.name: Submission
attacks.effect: Machoke does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Flail
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times number of damage counters on Magikarp.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Magmar in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Double Kick
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Amnesia
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of defenders attacks. Defender cannot use that attack next turn.

attacks.name: Doubleslap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 30 damage times number of heads.

attacks.name: Conversion 1
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has a Weakness, you may change it to a type of your choice other than Colorless.

attacks.name: Conversion 2
attacks.effect: Change Porygon's Resistance to a type of your choice other than Colorless.

attacks.name: Super Fang
attacks.effect: Does damage to the Defending Pokémon equal to half the Defending Pokémon's remaining HP (rounded up to the nearest 10).

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Wartortle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Psyshock
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Leech Seed
attacks.effect: Unless all damage from this attack is prevented, you may remove 1 damage counter from Bulbasaur.

attacks.name: String Shot
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Charmander in order to use this attack.

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Sleeping Gas
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Destiny Bond
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card attached to Gastly in order to use this attack. If a Pokémon Knocks Out Gastly during your opponent's next turn, Knock Out that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Foul Gas
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned; if tails, it is now Confused.

attacks.name: Thunder Wave
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Selfdestruct
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each Pokémon on each player's Bench. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) Magnemite does 40 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Stiffen
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Metapod during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Stun Spore
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Horn Hazard
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Harden
attacks.effect: During opponent's next turn, whenever 30 or less damage is done to Onix (after applying Weakness and Resistance), prevent that damage. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.effect: If your opponent has any Benched Pokémon, he or she chooses 1 of them and switches it with the Defending Pokémon. (Do the damage before switching the Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Thunder Jolt
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, Pikachu does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Water Gun
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 damage for each Energy attached to Poliwag but not used to pay for this attack's Energy cost. Extra Energy after the end don't count.

attacks.name: Sand-attack
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Bubble
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Withdraw
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Squirtle during your opponent's next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.effect: Discard 1 Energy card to Starmie in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Starmie.

attacks.name: Star Freeze
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Bind
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poisonpowder
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Confuse Ray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.
